statements: UPDATE board_meeting_minutes SET attendees = ARRAY['Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie'] WHERE meeting_id = 1;
UPDATE board_meeting_minutes SET meeting_date = '2022-10-15', meeting_time = '09:30:00' WHERE meeting_id = 2;
UPDATE board_meeting_minutes SET attendees = array_append(attendees, 'John Doe') WHERE meeting_id = 1;
UPDATE board_meeting_minutes SET meeting_date = '2022-09-15', minutes = 'Reviewed financial statements and approved budget' WHERE meeting_id = 2;
UPDATE board_meetings SET meeting_location='Conference Room A' WHERE meeting_id=1;
UPDATE attendees SET is_present=true, attendee_role='Chairman' WHERE attendee_id=5;
UPDATE board_meetings SET meeting_location='Conference Room A', meeting_notes='Minutes have been updated.' WHERE meeting_id=1;
UPDATE attendees SET attendee_role='Vice President', is_present=true WHERE meeting_id=1 AND attendee_name='John Doe';
UPDATE board_meeting_minutes SET meeting_notes = 'Updated meeting notes' WHERE meeting_id = 1;
UPDATE attendees SET role = 'Secretary' WHERE attendee_id = 2;
UPDATE board_meeting_minutes SET meeting_notes = 'Discuss budget and future projects' WHERE meeting_id = 1;
UPDATE attendees SET role = 'Chairperson' WHERE attendee_id = 2;
UPDATE board_meetings SET meeting_location = 'Conference Room A' WHERE meeting_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE attendees SET attendee_name = 'John Doe', attendee_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE attendee_id = '98765432-1234-5678-9012-345678901234';
UPDATE board_meetings SET meeting_location = 'Conference Room A', meeting_duration = INTERVAL '2 hours' WHERE meeting_id = '8496dd57-c55b-4f89-b5cf-6b1793994849';
UPDATE agenda_items SET agenda_description = 'Discuss financial reports and projections' WHERE meeting_id = '8496dd57-c55b-4f89-b5cf-6b1793994849' AND agenda_title = 'Financial Review';
UPDATE BoardMembers SET position = 'Treasurer' WHERE member_id = 1;
UPDATE MeetingMinutes SET minute_text = 'Approved minutes of the meeting' WHERE minute_id = 3;
UPDATE BoardMembers SET position = 'Chairperson' WHERE member_id = 101;
UPDATE MeetingMinutes SET minute_text = 'Reviewed financial reports and approved budget' WHERE meeting_id = 201 AND member_id = 102;
